creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: dark blue and off-white; eleven narrow panels, sewn together at long edges; short fringe; blue and off-white stripes vertically; white chevron stitching near short edges with tassels at each seam and long edges; horizontal band of off-white stripes and band of hourglass-like shape formed by pair of mirrored triangles embroidered near each short edge; design in center is checkered square formed by off-white embroidered chevron/diamond and checker patterns in square and rectangular shapes
title: Wrapper
